original_text: And the streams thereof shall be turned into pitch, and the dust thereof into brimstone, and the land thereof shall become burning pitch.
korean_text: 에돔의 시내들은 변하여 역청이 되고 그 티끌은 유황이 되고 그 땅은 불 붙는 역청이 되며

sentences.original_text: And streams thereof shall be turned into pitch
and the dust thereof into brimstone
and the land thereof shall become burning pitch
sentences.korean_translation: 그 땅은 불타는 역청이 될 것이라
